alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:46PM EDT until July 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mercer County in central Kentucky... East central Washington County in central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Springfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Harrodsburg, Willisburg, Cardwell, Hardesty, Battle, Cornishville, Mooresville, Polin, Riverview Estates and Bohon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
